data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Sari Pul to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sari Pul, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Sari Pul.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6269 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 727,185 lost in Sari Pul that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sari Pul. Through your servants plant 145 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hazara people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, give the disciples of the the state of Sari Pul an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 727,162 lost people in  Sari Pul, Afghanistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sari Pul, Afghanistan has a population of 727,300.

We estimate Sari Pul has 116 people who might know Jesus, 23 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 727,162 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,269 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sari Pul to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
